response.overview: Cleo and Kristal often have lucrative nights at the gentleman's club. But these past few nights have been a real bust. Cleo has made very little, but when she asks Kristal about her night, Kristal's eyes widen and she is very sheepish. Seems she has lifted a wealthy patrons wallet. However she has forgotten to bring it home and it sits in her locker at work. Suddenly a knock at the door declares the arrival of Mr. Johnson from the club. He has interrogated several employees and all fingers point to Cleo and Kristal. Taking matters into his own hands he decides to bind and gag these beautiful but naughty women. They will tell him the truth. And indeed they do, as we see numerous revealing positions and slowly their clothing is removed. Before they can return to the club for a locker search Kristal admits to the theft. They are told they can keep their jobs if he can bind and gag them once a week until he decides they have done their time.
response.title: Busted
